parameters.query:
INSERT INTO finance.transactions (
  transaction_at,
  date,
  merchant_name,
  amount,
  currency,
  category,
  notes,
  is_recurring,
  client_id
)
VALUES (
  '{{ $json.body.transaction_at }}'::timestamptz,
  finance.to_business_date('{{ $json.body.transaction_at }}'::timestamptz),
  '{{ $json.body.source }}',
  {{ $json.body.amount }},
  COALESCE('{{ $json.body.currency }}', 'AED'),
  '{{ $json.body.category }}',
  {{ $json.body.notes ? "'" + $json.body.notes + "'" : "NULL" }},
  {{ $json.body.is_recurring ? 'true' : 'false' }},
  '{{ $json.body.client_id }}'
)
ON CONFLICT (client_id) DO NOTHING
RETURNING *;
